document.full_text: jackson hewitt tax service inc  expects quick approval of its bankruptcy plan, which would turn over the second-largest u.s. tax preparer to lenders led by bayside capital, the company's attorney said on wednesday.
document.title: jackson hewitt sees quick bankruptcy plan approval
lines_and_colors: jackson hewitt tax service inc  expects quick approval of its bankruptcy plan, which would turn over the second-largest u.s. tax preparer to lenders led by bayside capital, the company's attorney said on wednesday.
